comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15024?focusedCommentId=17455186) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
Similar to ARROW-14708.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15024?focusedCommentId=17455228) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Looks like we are missing one of the `libgoogle_cloud_cpp_*.so.1.34.1` libraries, sadly I have no idea which one.
